rights: Right to safe and quality products
next_steps: Contact the seller first to resolve the issue
File complaint with Consumer Protection Office
Seek compensation if product caused damage
defective_products.simplified_explanation: If you buy something that doesn't work or is broken, you can return it and get your money back or a replacement.

overcharging.scenario: Being charged more than the actual price
rights: Right to file complaint against overcharging
next_steps: Check official price lists or market rates
Request proper receipt with correct pricing
overcharging.simplified_explanation: Sellers cannot charge you more than the fair price. If they do, you can complain and get help.

rights: Right to complain about poor service
Right to compensation for poor service
next_steps: Complain directly to service provider first
File complaint with relevant regulatory body
poor_service.simplified_explanation: You deserve good service when you pay for it. If service is poor, you can complain and seek better treatment.

general_info.complaint_process: File complaint within 2 years of purchase
general_info.mediation: Consumer Protection Office provides mediation services
general_info.consumer_court: Escalate to consumer court if mediation fails
